name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Linda WESTON. Petition of Philadelphia Media Network, Inc. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. Eddie Wright. Petition of Philadelphia Media Network, Inc. parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Linda WESTON. Petition of Philadelphia Media Network, Inc. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. Eddie Wright. Petition of Philadelphia Media Network, Inc. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of April, 2012, the Application for Leave to File a Reply to the Commonwealth’s Answer is GRANTED. Additionally, the Application for Extraordinary Relief and King’s Bench Powers is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Linda WESTON. Petition of Philadelphia Media Network, Inc. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. Eddie Wright. Petition of Philadelphia Media Network, Inc. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 17, 2012.
